= }} 'Reach Canada' is a Non Governmental Organization that helps people with
all types of disabilities obtain a lawyer referral. It is dedicated to educating
and informing people with disabilities, lawyers and the general public about the
rights and interests of persons with disabilities through programs, conferences
and seminars. Reach also collaborates in several projects with the Judicial
System of Canada. Simpson, Ann (2000) Reach:
Equality and Justice for People with Disabilities, Canada. Caledon Institute of
Social Policy. ISBN 1-894159-87-X
